title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Multi-tenant global ML SaaS platform (ISV306)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建多租户全球机器学习SaaS平台 (ISV306)
abstract: Get insight into how Qlik built a multi-tenant ML SaaS that processes 100,000 GPU-intensive training jobs monthly with 99.99% reliability. Learn about Qlik's proven patterns for scaling ML operations across global regions while optimizing costs through dynamic resource allocation. We'll share the architectural decisions that enabled supporting 2,500 organizations and 167,000 trained models. Essential knowledge for ISVs transforming ML capabilities into scalable SaaS solutions.
abstract_cn: 了解 Qlik 如何构建多租户机器学习 SaaS，每月处理 100,000 个 GPU 密集型训练作业，可靠性达到 99.99%。学习 Qlik 在全球区域扩展机器学习运营的成熟模式，同时通过动态资源分配优化成本。我们将分享支持 2,500 个组织和 167,000 个训练模型的架构决策。这是 ISV 将机器学习能力转化为可扩展 SaaS 解决方案的必备知识。
